title: Underneath
description: With New Agey parents and a Pakistani heritage, it might have been difficult for Sunny Pryce-Shah to fit in. Thankfully, she had her older, popular cousin Shiri to talk to-until now. Shiri's shocking suicide brings heart-wrenching pain and grief, and also seems to have triggered a new and disturbing ability in hearing people's thoughts.
author: Sarah Jamila Stevenson
